name: UnGrav
description:
Love runner games? Love to play games with friends? Play in a runner game with a friend!

First local multiplayer runner game! Take your anti-grave car and beat your friend!

Trim and substitute your opponent in infinite race! Or be the team and try to get the maximal score! Try to find the easiest passes. Choose your anti-grave and go! Best perfomance and gameplay for competition with your friend.

Or play in one player mode to train your skill. Different landscapes and cool soundtracks will make your race unrepeatable!

GO!
